metadata.title: CVE-2024-46730 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Ensure array index tg_inst won't be -1[WHY & HOW]tg_inst will be a negative if timing_generator_count equals 0, whichshould be checked before used.This fixes 2 OVERRUN issues reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
